verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel were waiting for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when an iconic photograph was taken over the weekend showing the two leaders in what appeared to be a confrontation] .

President Donald Trump said he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel [V: were] waiting for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when an iconic photograph was taken over the weekend showing the two leaders in what appeared to be a confrontation .

President Donald Trump said [ARG1: he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel] were [V: waiting] [ARG2: for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when an iconic photograph was taken over the weekend showing the two leaders in what appeared to be a confrontation] .

President Donald Trump said he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel were waiting for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when an iconic photograph [V: was] taken over the weekend showing the two leaders in what appeared to be a confrontation .

President Donald Trump said he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel were waiting for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when [ARG1: an iconic photograph] was [V: taken] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] showing the two leaders in what appeared to be a confrontation .

President Donald Trump said he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel were waiting for a final draft of a joint statement by G-7 leaders when [ARG0: an iconic photograph] was taken over the weekend [V: showing] [ARG1: the two leaders] [ARGM-LOC: in what appeared to be a confrontation] .
